caption.p: Trends in ( a) Maize; ( b) Irrigated maize; ( c) Non-irrigated maize; ( d) Sorghum; ( e) Irrigated sorghum; ( f) Non-irrigated sorghum; ( g) Soybean; ( h) Irrigated soybean; ( i) Non-irrigated soybean yields in the Great Plains counties over the period 1968–2013. Trends are represented in kg ha −1 yr −1. Counties with striped lines indicate that the trend in the county was statistically significant to 95% confidence level. Only those counties were shown which had at least 50% of the total data records. We created the maps using ESRI ArcMap 10.4.1 software http://desktop.arcgis.com/en/arcmap/.
